DOC.brief_summary: This study compare intraoperative fit patient-specific iTotal knee replacement standard knee replacement implant
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Fit iTotal Versus Standard Total Knee Implants
DOC.detailed_description: The study design single center , two arm analysis . The study complete two phase , base measurement type . All additional data obtain pre post-operative subject survey , operative discharge record radiograph .
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule standard total knee replacement Patient schedule patientspecific total knee replacement ( iTotal ) Patient age > 18 year Patients receive total knee replacement Unwilling unable comply study requirement
